name: Troy Kingi
description: '''Troy Kingi''' (born 1984) is a New Zealand musician and actor from [[Northland Region|Northland]], first receiving media attention when he appeared in the 2013 film ''[[Mt. Zion (film)|Mt. Zion]]''. Kingi is a multi-instrumentalist, is known for his 10/10/10 project: the plan to release 10 albums in 10 genres across 10 years.
